examples.en: He referred to the issue in the meeting.
examples.zh: 他在会议上提到了这个问题。

examples.en: She referred the matter to the authorities.
examples.zh: 她将此事转交给了当局。

examples.en: They referred to the problem yesterday.
examples.zh: 他们昨天提到了这个问题。

examples.en: I referred the case to the legal department last week.
examples.zh: 我上周将这个案件转交给了法律部门。

examples.en: The issue has been referred to the experts.
examples.zh: 这个问题已经被转交给专家了。

examples.en: She has referred the matter to the higher authorities.
examples.zh: 她已经将此事转交给了上级部门。
